alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued August 04 at 9:49PM CDT until August 05 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 586 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 1 AM CDT SATURDAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL KANSAS PHILLIPS IN NEBRASKA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 15 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL NEBRASKA GREELEY HOWARD SHERMAN VALLEY IN SOUTH CENTRAL NEBRASKA ADAMS BUFFALO DAWSON FRANKLIN FURNAS GOSPER HALL HARLAN KEARNEY PHELPS WEBSTER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALMA, ARAPAHOE, BEAVER CITY, BLADEN, BLUE HILL, CAMBRIDGE, CAMPBELL, COZAD, ELWOOD, FRANKLIN, GOTHENBURG, GRAND ISLAND, GREELEY, HASTINGS, HILDRETH, HOLDREGE, HOLLINGER, INAVALE, JOHNSON LAKE, KEARNEY, LEXINGTON, LITCHFIELD, LOUP CITY, MINDEN, ORD, ORLEANS, OXFORD, PHILLIPSBURG, RED CLOUD, ROSEMONT, SCOTIA, SHERMAN RESERVOIR, SPALDING, ST. PAUL, WILLOW ISLAND, AND WOLBACH.
